column3: Should the dust check be added to this check?

>  If there is ever a minimum nAmount introduced for OP_RETURN outputs, it should be called differently than 'dust limit'.\n\nAgree. Though, I think that `GetDustThreshold` should be defined and callable for all scriptPubKeys, not only spendable ones. This is also what the current function does. In any case the discussion is theoretical, as only test code is affected.
